convert.description: Convert command is currently used to convert CUC Database data.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number to indicate how many records to import at a time

key.name: key
key.description: This is required in order to offset / limit in SQLExpress. It is the ORDER BY [Key]

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Number to Indicate the start point where to begin importing from

selector.name: selector
selector.description: String indicating field names to select delimited by a single comma in between

errors.name: errors
errors.description: File name to output errors to. Leave blank to not receive error logs

logs.name: logs
logs.description: File name to output conversion information to. Leave blank to not receive conversion logs

statements.name: statements
statements.description: File name to output query statements to. Leave blank to not receive statement logs

args.name: source
args.description:
The handler identifier that is used to aggregate data to be converted.
      Each supplies a unique action

args.name: destination
args.description: The handler identifier that is used to tell the program how to convert

args.name: source
args.description: The relative, or absolute location of a CSV that needs to be converted

args.name: destination
args.description: The relative, or absolute location to generate the file

args.description: The relative, or absolute location of a CSV that needs to be converted

args.name: destination
args.description: The relative, or absolute location to generate the file
